text: Kaya te yacya antima nirnayaci vata pahata ahe? Jya divasi yaca antima nirnaya ye'una pohocela, tara jya lokanni yapurvi yaca visara padala, te mhanatila ki amacya palanakartyace rasula (paigambara) satya ghe'una ale, tara kaya koni amaci sipharasa karanara ahe, jyane amacyasathi sipharasa karavi? Kinva amhala dusaryanda (jagata) pathavile gele asate, tara tyakherija karma kele asate, je (purvi) karita rahilo. Tyanni svatahla nukasanagrasta kele ani jya gosti manane racata rahile, tyancyapasuna haravalya
